item.title: Hand cannon shots
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

Ok, well I made some Hand cannon shots. One problem, they won’t go into their correct slot…

} else if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("shots")) { targetSlot=13; } I get no errors, my hand cannon shot ID is 15339. But when I try to wield them, they still go into slot 3 (Weapons)…
Yes, I checked, they are spelled correctly. “Hand cannon shots”

Read full topic
